title: Ruff Trading 22.9% Higher  This Week (RUFF)
content: Ruff (CURRENCY:RUFF) traded 4.2% lower  against the U.S. dollar during the twenty-four hour period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. One Ruff token can now be bought for approximately $0.10 or 0.00001369 BTC on major cryptocurrency exchanges including Huobi,  fex and  Gate.io. Ruff has a total market capitalization of $96.19 million and approximately $11.76 million worth of Ruff was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. In the last seven days, Ruff has traded 22.9% higher  against the U.S. dollar.    Here is how similar cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:        Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008417 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded 3.9% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003901 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 1% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $1.88 or 0.00024687 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.5% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0609 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded up 3.9% against the dollar and now trades at $56.55 or 0.00741909 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded down 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012998 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded 10% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048808 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.68 or 0.00192586 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded 9.2% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $7.67 or 0.00100615 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded up 7.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC.   Ruff Profile     Ruff’s launch date was January 11th, 2018. Ruff’s total supply is 1,840,000,000 tokens and its circulating supply is 921,800,000 tokens. The Reddit community for Ruff is /r/ruffchain and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here . Ruff’s official website is ruffchain.com . Ruff’s official Twitter account is @Ruff_Chain and its Facebook page is accessible here . The official message board for Ruff is medium.com/@ruffchain .  Buying and Selling Ruff    Ruff can be purchased on these cryptocurrency exchanges:  Gate.io,  fex and Huobi.  It is usually not currently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as Ruff directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade Ruff should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Changelly, Gemini or GDAX. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy Ruff using one of the exchanges listed above.
